title: Action Codes Prefix Metadata v1
description: Canonical metadata schema for Action Codes protocol prefixes

title.description: Represents the source of the action request (brand, app, or person).

icon.description: Absolute HTTP/HTTPS URL to an icon image (SVG, PNG, or WebP). Client must reject invalid URLs.

description.description: Information about the action, shown to users.

label.description: Text displayed on a user action button; should start with a verb, max 5 words.

intentCategories.description: Categories of actions this prefix may perform, e.g., payment, stake, vote.

website.description: Official website for branding / verification purposes.

contact.description: Flexible contact information, e.g., email, telegram, discord.
